title: Engro Holdings Profit Jumps to Rs. 107 Billion In 2025

title: Zimbabwe Pushes Manufacturers to Use Local Raw Materials Under New Strategy
desc: Industry and Commerce Minister Dr Mangaliso Ndlovu has revealed that the government will soon roll out a Local Content Strategy aimed at promoting the use of locally manufactured raw materials in Zimbabwe's manufacturing sector.

title: Sophia Akuffo Breaks Silence on Protest Against Akufo
desc: Former Chief Justice, Sophia Akuffo, explained why she joined the 2023 protest against the Domestic Debt Exchange Programme, stating she had no regrets.

title: Columbia Study Confirms Quantum Fluctuations Alter Properties Of Nearby Crystals
desc: Researchers have confirmed that quantum fluctuations within two-dimensional materials can alter the properties of nearby crystals, experimentally realizing a long-held theoretical possibility. The Columbia study demonstrates how these fluctuations, specifically vibrations in hexagonal Boron Nitride, can impact superconductivity in a neighboring material without external forces.

title: Zero-alcohol ads may increase teens’ intent to drink alcohol
desc: Findings indicate zero-alcohol advertising could serve as indirect marketing for alcohol, raising questions about its impact on adolescent drinking behaviors.

title: Watch as GNFS officer alleges father's retirement benefits withheld pending bribe
desc: A senior officer of the Ghana National Fire Service (GNFS) has recounted how her retired father was forced to pay a bribe to receive his pension benefits.

title: Xie Shaoguang declined to participate in Star Awards 2026 despite being Best Actor front runner
desc: Emerald Hill's stars Chantalle Ng and Tasha Low also responded to their Best Actress nominations. Read more at straitstimes.com.

title: Raye Reflects on Heartbreak on Emotive Single 'Nightingale Lane'
desc: Raye released a new single, "Nightingale Lane,' off her forthcoming album 'This Album May Contain Hope.'
